languages.text: "Астропат, вспомни золотое сияние святой Терры и свои клятвы. Он ждет от тебя стойкости".

traits.locale_text: "Это наваждение привязано к тебе, Вайс. Ты обязан высвободиться из-под его влияния, иначе весь корабль окажется под угрозой".

languages.text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
languages.original_text: "Астропат, вспомни золотое сияние святой Терры и свои клятвы. Он ждет от тебя стойкости".

traits.locale_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of the Astronomican. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
"Astropath, remember the golden radiance of the Astronomican. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
"Astropath, remember the golden radiance of the Astronomican. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
"Astropath, remember the golden radiance of the Astronomican. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
"Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
"Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."

languages.text: «Astrópata, recuerde el resplandor dorado de la Sagrada Terra. Recuerde sus juramentos. Él quiere que se mantenga firme».
languages.original_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."

traits.locale_text: «Astrópata, recuerde el resplandor dorado del Astronomicón. Recuerde sus juramentos. Él quiere que se mantenga firme».

languages.text: 「感応通信官よ、聖なる地球の黄金の輝きを思い出せ。己の誓いを思い出せ。君の揺らがない精神が必要とされている」
languages.original_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."

traits.locale_text: 「感応通信官よ、星辰波の黄金の輝きを思い出せ。己の誓いを思い出せ。君の揺らがない精神が必要とされている」

languages.text: “星语者，不要忘记神圣泰拉的金色明光，不要忘记你许下的誓言。神皇要求你坚定不移。”
languages.original_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."

traits.locale_text: “星语者，不要忘记星炬的金色明光，不要忘记你许下的誓言。神皇要求你坚定不移。”

languages.text: "Astropath, erinnert Euch an das goldene Strahlen des heiligen Terra. Erinnert Euch an Eure eigenen Schwüre. Er möchte, dass Ihr standhaft bleibt."
languages.original_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."

traits.locale_text: "Astropath, erinnert Euch an das goldene Strahlen des Astronomican. Erinnert Euch an Eure eigenen Schwüre. Er möchte, dass Ihr standhaft bleibt."

languages.text: « Astropathe, souvenez-vous de la radiance dorée de la Sainte Terra. Souvenez-vous de vos serments. Il compte sur vous. »
languages.original_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."

traits.locale_text: « Astropathe, souvenez-vous de la radiance dorée de l'Astonomican. Souvenez-vous de vos serments. Il compte sur vous. »

languages.text: "Astropat, Kutsal Terra'nın altın ışıltısını hatırla. Ettiğin yeminleri hatırla. İmparator senden kararlı olmanı bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "Astropath, remember the golden radiance of Holy Terra. Remember your own oaths. He wants you to be steadfast."
